Строки документа",! Write "",! Write !,"" Write !,!,"" Write !,!,"" Write !,"

Method.name: OnPageCSPROOT
Method.Implementation: s Kontr=%request.Get("Kontr") s silent=%request.Get("silent") Write ! Do ..OnPageHTML()

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,"<title>"_($G(%session.Data("systemname")))_"</title>",! Write "<link href=""style.css"" type=text/css rel=stylesheet>" Write !,!,"<script language=""Jscript"" src=""common.js"">" Write "</script>" Write !,"<script language=""JScript"">" Write !,"var Arguments=window.dialogArguments.split(InnerSplitter);",! Write "var ClassName=Arguments[0];",! Write "var DocID=Arguments[1];",! Write "var DocType=""Заявка на комплектующие"";",! Write "var source="""";",! Write "var Kontr="""_(Kontr)_""";",! Write !,"function load(){",! Write "PropTable.ClassName=ClassName;",! Write "TypDocument.innerText=DocType;",! Write "var hidefields=""Dat,Tim,Stat,Source,DocType,Kontr,Otchet,User1"";",! Write "if(DocID=="""")var hidefields=hidefields+"",Oplacheno""",! Write "PropTable.DownLoadPairs("""",DocID,hidefields,source);",! Write "docstr.ClassName=ClassName+""Items"";",! Write "if(source!=""""){docstr.attachEvent(""onAddColumns"",loadgoods)}",! Write "else{docstr.attachEvent(""onAddColumns"",loadgoods2)}",! Write "docstr.LoadHeadersXML(""Doc,DocType"");",! Write "}",! Write !,"function loadgoods(){",! Write "docstr.GetFromCard(source,""Goods.Goods"",""Name"",""AllDocuments"")",! Write "}",! Write !,"function loadgoods2(){",! Write "if(DocID!=""""){",! Write "docstr.loadfrommethod(""Docs.Action.GetStrFromDoc"",DocID,2,3)}",! Write "}",! Write !,"function startFun(){",! Write "var xmldoc=PropTable.GetXmlContent();",! Write "xmldoc=addnode(xmldoc,""Kontr"",Kontr+""@Common.Kontragent"")",! Write "var xmldoc2=docstr.GetXmlContent();",! Write "var ok=SplitSendXml("""",ClassName,xmldoc,xmldoc2,"""_(%session.SessionId)_""");",! Write "if(isNaN(ok)){",! Write " alert(ok);",! Write "}",! Write "else{",! Write " if(source!=""""){",! Write " var ok="_($case(%session.BrokerImplementation,1:"cspRunServerMethod",2:"cspHttpServerMethod",:"cspSelectServerMethod"))_"('"_(..Encrypt($listbuild("Docs.Action.SetSourceDoc:csp.remdoc"))_$select(%session.UseSessionCookie'=2:"&CSPCHD="_%session.CSPSessionCookie,1:""))_"',ClassName,ok,source)",! Write " if(isNaN(ok))alert(ok)",! Write " }",! Write " returnValue=1;",! Write " window.close();",! Write "}",! Write "}",! Write !,"function addtovars(){",! Write "WinResult=window.showModalDialog(""selectgoods2.csp"","""",""cener:yes;status:no;dialogHeight:700px;dialogWidth:800px;resizable:yes;"")",! Write "if(WinResult==null)return",! Write "WinResult=WinResult.split(StringSplitter)",! Write "var FieldCaption = new Array();",! Write "var FieldValue = new Array();",! Write "for(i=0 ; i<WinResult.length-1 ; i++){",! Write " var onestr=WinResult[i].split(InnerSplitter);",! Write " FieldCaption[""Goods""]=onestr[1];",! Write " FieldValue[""Goods""]=onestr[0];",! Write " FieldCaption[""Price""]=getPrice(FieldValue[""Goods""]);",! Write " docstr.AddRow(FieldCaption,FieldValue);",! Write "}",! Write "}",! Write !,"function getPrice(tovid){",! Write "return "_($case(%session.BrokerImplementation,1:"cspRunServerMethod",2:"cspHttpServerMethod",:"cspSelectServerMethod"))_"('"_(..Encrypt($listbuild("Goods.GoodsAction.getprice:csp.remdoc"))_$select(%session.UseSessionCookie'=2:"&CSPCHD="_%session.CSPSessionCookie,1:""))_"',tovid);",! Write "}",! Write !,"function checkgarant(){",! Write "var xmldoc=PropTable.GetXmlContent();",! Write "var xmldoc2=docstr.GetXmlContent();",! Write "var ok=SplitSendXml("""",ClassName,xmldoc,xmldoc2,"""_(%session.SessionId)_""",""Docs.Action.checkgarant"");",! Write "if(isNaN(ok)){alert(ok);return}",! Write "WinResult=window.showModalDialog(""checkgarant.csp"","""",""cener:yes;status:no;dialogHeight:700px;dialogWidth:800px;resizable:yes;"")",! Write "}",! Write !,"function setsumm(){",! Write "var val=docstr.Total;",! Write "var val=val.toFixed(2);",! Write "PropTable.setCellValue(""Summa"",val);",! Write "}",! Write !,"</script>" Write !,(..HyperEventHead()) Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html XMLNS:SKLADz XMLNS:SKLAD2 XMLNS:SKLADList>" Write !,"<IMPORT NAMESPACE=""SKLADz"" IMPLEMENTATION=""htc/treeview.htc"">",! Write "<IMPORT NAMESPACE=""SKLAD2"" IMPLEMENTATION=""htc/table.htc"">",! Write "<IMPORT NAMESPACE=""SKLADList"" IMPLEMENTATION=""htc/listview.htc"">",! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write ! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
